mainText:
We will always remember you steve....
Those were the days when we would eagerly wait for the launch of any "Apple"
product and spend sleepless nights outside the shop waiting to get hold of
the newly launched apple product.

Steve...you have been an inspiring person and great human being as a whole..


Rest In Peace Sir Steve Jobs!...

Feels like the roots of the "Apple" tree has been uprooted.... :((((
author: Sri
